website_summaries.verdict: This compact fuel transfer pump runs on direct current from your vehicle.
pros: Impeller and other parts made from cast steel for durability
Operates for diesel, machine oil, and transformer oil
Has enough power to pump motor oil
cons: The transfer pump uses British pipe thread, and it is better to remain consistent or use thread compound for other fittings

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat The Price
customer_reviews.text: This pump is excellent for the price. I wasn't expecting a cast iron housing for $47. we are using it to fill a 100 gallon diesel tank. It takes about 30 minutes to fill the generator, but we are pumping from a bottom connection on the supply tank, making it faster. Nearest option was three times the price. I do wish they offered one with one inch connections and a little bigger pump. Pump is smooth and quiet. This was a low cost solution for a temporary situation, so I am highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Stone

customer_reviews.title: JUST. WOW. Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely blown away at the amount of pumping power this thing has. First of all, there is no need to even prime the lines. I had about 10 foot of 1in heater hose going out to my jugs. The pump is so powerful that it took roughly 30 seconds to transfer a 5 gallon jug! It runs super quiet and helped me get my 25 KW diesel generator filled up in a few minutes. NOTE= you will need 1" I.D. heater hose or fuel hose as this item does not include the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This 12 volt dc pump worked flawlessly. I needed to pump 300 gallons of number one heating oil (diesel) from 55 gallon drums into a new holding tank. The only other pumps in town for this application we're $229. This pump is an outstanding deal for price and quality. I could not use the cheap filter that came with it however. The filter could not be sleeved into a 3/4" hose property. That is my only problem with it. Other than that, excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Swoopdog

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thing in April of 2019 and finally hooked it up to use it today. Hoses connected and in the tank. Connected to 12 volts, switched on and it spun for about 10 seconds and locked up. Didn't even draw anything through it. Its now too late to ask for a refund. The only transferring this pump did was moving 50 bucks from my pocket to theirs.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Works great, the threads are 3/4" British pipe thread and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the threads are 3/4" British pipe thread and the fitting takes a 1" hose. if you use their fittings all is good , I put a filter in line and used 3/4" US pipe fittings had to use a good thread compound to keeping it from leaking. But the pump works well pumping diesel from my reserve tank.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Motor work fine transferring #2 oil, instructions could have been more concise. Did the job.
customer_reviews.author: gerard j moriarty

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast okay now I've had it after pumping 500 gallon through several times
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had had good small pumps before, I sure do now. This thing is a beast. I'm adding to my original, calling this thing a beast is an understatement. I pump 50 gallons at a time with a 15 foot lift. When the product I'm pumping Runs Out it blows the line clean even with a 15 ft lift and there is air blowing out. Disconnecting no problem lines are clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dave's cyber security

customer_reviews.title: With some minor fitting adaptation it works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Best to install 2 3/4 male pipe thread tubes with 3/4 female unions to brass 3/4 to garden hose adapters and seal with either nylon tape or thread compound. This makes connecting to hose easy and once done easy to put away. Filled 2 - 55 gallon drums in short order.
customer_reviews.author: Rd2k

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how long it will last.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to really struggle when transfering diesel fuel from spare tank to truck tank, no head pressure. When nozzle is shut off when tank is full the pump really loads up and have to really run to shut off power. Only transfer fuel about once every month or so.
customer_reviews.author: reschooler00

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this to empty 5 gallon cans of Kerosene. The pump itself was perfect but the threads look like BSPP instead of NPT. They can't be tightened without squeezing the o-ring out. I got the first 5 cans emptied and now need to find a better way to attach a 1" suction and discharge hose. It is the down side of spending $39 instead of $250.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. There is nothing that we don't like about this diesel pump.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Holt

customer_reviews.title: Dangers
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have had. Works great when it works. Both have overheated and melted the power leads. If I had not been there for some reason a fire may have happened. Only pumped 70 gallons. NOT HAPPY! Opened it up and the wires were melted all the way into the motor. I have pictures... What can be done about this? I need a pump.
customer_reviews.author: steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Pump works, pluming is hard to hook up to anything except the fittings that came with the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T.

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Unit was useless, tried to pump the oil from my boat motors, even when the oil was hot and thin it could not pump it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: lasted for only 3 drums
customer_reviews.text: used to transfer diesel from 55 gallon drums. only lasted for 3 of the 5 i had to do. the seal gave up and when i opened it up to try to fix, one of the 3 screws stripped dont waste your money on this one.... spend more and get a better quality pump
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: Great pump for fuel oil transfer
customer_reviews.text: The pump worked flawlessly for transferring 300 gallons of #2 fuel oil
customer_reviews.author: JAron

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Used it to balance diesel fuel from starboard to port fuel tank on my trawler...did exactly that quite quickly. All the fittings were okay, but not robust, so used my own. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Suntansailor

customer_reviews.title: This is a fuel oil transfer pump , not for gasoline
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fuel transfer pump. Came with inlet and outlet tubing adapters and a filter for the suction end. Fast pumping, fills a 50 gallon drum in minutes. Light weight and easy to move around. Absolutely no negative about this pump. Used to transfer fuel oil out of a leaking tank .
customer_reviews.author: Gerald O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Good pump
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this pump on a stand with a fuel filter and used it to remove water and dirt & rust from a few fuel tanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gorden

customer_reviews.title: Great pump, great value
customer_reviews.text: The only reason for 4 stars is that the duty cycle is only 30 minutes & then unit needs to be off for 30 minutes....makes polishing 300 gallons of diesel a long process.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Got the pump about 3 months ago I use it every day and it’s the best
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Works fast
customer_reviews.text: The item came in a timely manner. The hose is an odd size to connect to, we had to go to Lowes and find something to fit and improvise. Other then that one little issue it worked like a charm. We moved 200 gallons of heating fuel in a half hour.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Beard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last to long!
customer_reviews.text: POS! Pumped a total 80 gallons over a period of 2 weeks. Stopped pumping. Not worth it buy a better more reliable pump. There’s a reason why it’s so cheap. The leads are really short you have to extend them.
customer_reviews.author: Action craft

customer_reviews.title: Lies and deception
customer_reviews.text: Can’t rate it low enough. Fitting size is 1 inch. Not 3/4 O-rings not the right size
customer_reviews.author: Tyler emm

customer_reviews.title: It only works for a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: Quit after a few minutes didn’t even finish pumping 50 gals
customer_reviews.author: Jpain

customer_reviews.title: flow direction?
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if inlet and outlet or flow direction was noted on pump. Pump worked fine. Very prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This product only worked for about 2 weeks of minimal use. Totally not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Dirk

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use but cycle life is too short
customer_reviews.author: Rob Thomas

customer_reviews.title: always recieved excelent merchandice
customer_reviews.text: ive used a lot of idems from amazon very happy with shipping and the ptoducts
customer_reviews.author: donnie fredritz

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Working good hopefully lasts longer than last one only made it a year
customer_reviews.author: EDDUNMIRE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with all satisfaction. I really need him
customer_reviews.author: Khalid almazroey

product_meta.title: Orion Motor Tech 12V Bio Diesel Kerosene Fuel Transfer Direct Current Pump Kit Nozzle Dispenser
feature_bullets: Featuring extra-thick copper wires, the 175W 3600rpm premium motor is made to last with minimal errors, significantly improving heat dissipation performance to lengthen service life, transfers fuel up to 45L/12Gal. per minute
Self-priming, rotating vane pump with an on/off switch and an inner bypass valve, able to lift oil up to 32 ft. of height
Orion Motor Tech’s latest self-priming oil pump features a mountable base while providing great portability, wires wrapped with premium rubber for superior durability and safety
The impeller is made of cast steel for durability, combined with the sturdy copper motor, provides stable performance while delivering unparalleled suction power
Compatible with diesel, machine oil and transformer oil; non-return valve available to prevent oil flowing back for improved efficiency

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars94 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
